item.title: 亚洲绿色航空燃料供不应求，预示着出口的到来
item.description: 石油公司高管和分析师说，随着更多的生产投产，亚洲供应可持续航空燃料的能力将在今明两年超过该地区的需求，从而增加出口，并有可能降低燃料的价格。【原文：Asia's ability to supply sustainable aviation fuel will outpace regional demand this year and next as more production comes online, increasing exports and potentially lowering prices for the fuel, oil executives and analysts said.】

item.title: 大众汽车与一汽合资公司将于 2026 年推出 11 款专为中国量身定制的新车型
item.description: 大众汽车和一汽集团（SASACJ.UL）的合资企业周一表示，将从 2026 年起推出 11 款为中国市场量身定制的大众和捷达品牌新车型。【原文：The joint venture of Volkswagen and FAW Group (SASACJ.UL) said on Monday it will launch 11 new Volkswagen and Jetta branded models tailored for the China market from 2026.】

item.title: 中国 1-2 月工业产出放缓，零售额增速加快
item.description: 今年 1 月至 2 月，中国工业产出放缓，而零售额增长略有加快，在政策制定者应对美国贸易关税带来的越来越大的压力之际，中国经济开局喜忧参半。【原文：China's industrial output slowed in January-February, while retail sales growth accelerated slightly in a mixed start for the economy this year as policymakers navigate mounting pressure from U.S. trade tariffs.】

item.title: 油价跳涨；对中国刺激消费的乐观情绪提振亚洲股市
item.description: 周一，油价飙升，美国股票期货下滑，而亚洲股票期货则冲高，因为投资者正在评估美国与世界其他地区之间截然不同的命运。【原文：Oil prices surged on Monday, U.S. stock futures slid while those in Asia charged higher as investors took stock of the contrasting fortunes between the United States and the rest of the world.】

item.title: 中国 2 月份新房价格下降
item.description: 周一的官方数据显示，中国 2 月份的新房价格下降了 0.1%，尽管政府承诺采取更多刺激措施，但饱受危机影响的房地产市场需求依然低迷。【原文：China's new home prices dropped 0.1% in February, official data showed on Monday, as demand in the crisis-stricken sector remains subdued despite the government's promises of more stimulus measures.】

item.title: 经济忧虑削弱信心，美元受挫；人民币坚挺
item.description: 受唐纳德-特朗普总统反复无常的贸易政策和一系列疲软宏观经济数据的打压，周一美元兑主要货币徘徊在五个月低点附近。【原文：The U.S. dollar hovered close to a five-month low against its major peers on Monday, pressured by President Donald Trump's erratic trade policies and a run of soft macroeconomic data.】

item.title: 经济忧虑削弱信心，美元受挫；人民币坚挺
item.description: 受唐纳德-特朗普总统反复无常的贸易政策和一系列疲软宏观经济数据的打压，周一美元兑主要货币徘徊在五个月低点附近。【原文：The U.S. dollar hovered close to a five-month low against its major peers on Monday, pressured by President Donald Trump's erratic trade policies and a run of soft macroeconomic data.】

item.title: 美国誓言继续攻击胡塞武装，布伦特原油本周开盘上涨
item.description: 布伦特原油期货本周开盘走高，周一亚市早盘上涨0.6%，此前美国誓言继续攻击也门胡塞武装，直到他们结束对航运的袭击。【原文：Brent crude futures opened the week higher, rising 0.6% in early Asian trade on Monday, after the United States vowed to keep attacking Yemen's Houthis until they end attacks on shipping.】

item.title: 澳大利亚国民银行称内森-古南辞去集团首席财务官职务
item.description: 澳大利亚国民银行（National Australia Bank）周一表示，内森-古南（Nathan Goonan）已辞去集团首席财务官一职，其他高管也有变动。【原文：National Australia Bank on Monday said Nathan Goonan has resigned as group chief financial officer amid other senior executive changes.】

item.title: 卢比奥称美国可能在加征关税后参与新的贸易协议
item.description: 美国国务卿马可-卢比奥（Marco Rubio）周日表示，一旦美国对其主要贸易伙伴征收关税，就可以与各国就新的贸易安排进行双边会谈。【原文：Once the United States has imposed tariffs on its major trading partners it could engage in bilateral talks with countries on new trade arrangements, Secretary of State Marco Rubio said on Sunday.】

item.title: 卢比奥称美国可能在加征关税后参与新的贸易协议
item.description: 美国国务卿马可-卢比奥（Marco Rubio）周日表示，一旦美国对其主要贸易伙伴征收关税，就可以与各国就新的贸易安排进行双边会谈。【原文：Once the United States has imposed tariffs on its major trading partners it could engage in bilateral talks with countries on new trade arrangements, Secretary of State Marco Rubio said on Sunday.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻 美联储关注关税引发的市场动荡，投资者寻求平静
item.description: 美国股市因唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统在外国进口关税问题上的反反复复而受到冲击，下周美联储将召开会议，投资者正在寻找有关进一步降息的暗示，这可能会让市场恢复一些平静。【原文：A U.S. stock market rocked by President Donald Trump's back-and-forth on foreign import tariffs faces a Federal Reserve meeting in the coming week, as investors look for hints about further interest rate cuts that could restore some calm to markets.】

item.title: 韩国贸易部长：美国呼吁更好地进入韩国市场
item.description: 韩国贸易部长周日表示，美国呼吁更好地进入韩国市场，特别是在农业和技术领域。【原文：The United States has called for better access to the Korean market, particularly in the agriculture and technology sectors, South Korea's trade minister said on Sunday.】

item.title: 法国总理称欧盟对美国波旁酒征收关税可能有误
item.description: 法国总理弗朗索瓦-贝鲁（Francois Bayrou）周日表示，欧盟在反击美国关税时将矛头指向美国威士忌可能是错误的，他呼吁举行会谈，以避免对法国干邑行业征收更具破坏性的关税。【原文：The European Union was probably mistaken in targeting American whiskey in its riposte to U.S. tariffs, French Prime Minister Francois Bayrou said on Sunday, calling for talks to avoid more damaging duties on France's cognac industry.】

item.title: 消息人士称，德国 ProSieben 公司就通用大西洋公司的交易召开董事会
item.description: 两位接近此事的消息人士告诉路透社，ProSiebenSat.1 监事会将于周日晚些时候召开会议，讨论美国私募股权公司 General Atlantic 可能获得这家德国广播公司少数股权的潜在交易。【原文：The supervisory board of ProSiebenSat.1 will meet later on Sunday to discuss a potential deal that could hand U.S. private equity firm General Atlantic a minority stake in the German broadcaster, two sources close to the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 消息人士称，德国 ProSieben 公司就通用大西洋公司的交易召开董事会
item.description: 两位接近此事的消息人士告诉路透社，ProSiebenSat.1 监事会将于周日晚些时候召开会议，讨论美国私募股权公司 General Atlantic 可能获得这家德国广播公司少数股权的潜在交易。【原文：The supervisory board of ProSiebenSat.1 will meet later on Sunday to discuss a potential deal that could hand U.S. private equity firm General Atlantic a minority stake in the German broadcaster, two sources close to the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 中国希望在消费紧缩中促进消费
item.description: 中国国务院周日公布了所谓的拉动内需 "专项行动计划"，主要措施包括增加居民收入和建立育儿补贴计划。【原文：China's State Council unveiled on Sunday what it called a "special action plan" to boost domestic consumption, featuring measures including increasing residents' income and establishing a childcare subsidy scheme.】

item.title: 土耳其竞争委员会开始调查视频服务提供商
item.description: 土耳其竞争委员会周日表示，已开始对 Netflix、迪斯尼和亚马逊等订阅式点播视频服务提供商展开调查。【原文：The Turkish Competition Board said on Sunday it has opened an investigation into subscription-based, on-demand video service providers, including Netflix , Disney and Amazon .】

item.title: 据布里克报道，瑞银集团首席执行官埃尔莫蒂将在 2024 年领取 1700 万美元的薪水
item.description: 瑞士日报《Blick》报道称，瑞银集团首席执行官塞尔吉奥-埃尔莫蒂 2024 年的薪酬总额略高于 1500 万瑞士法郎（约合 1700 万美元），但未说明从何处获得这一信息。【原文：The pay package of UBS CEO Sergio Ermotti came in just above 15 million Swiss francs ($17 million) in 2024, Swiss daily Blick reported, not citing where it obtained the information.】

item.title: 据布里克报道，瑞银集团首席执行官埃尔莫蒂将在 2024 年领取 1700 万美元的薪水
item.description: 瑞士日报《Blick》报道称，瑞银集团首席执行官塞尔吉奥-埃尔莫蒂 2024 年的薪酬总额略高于 1500 万瑞士法郎（约合 1700 万美元），但未说明从何处获得这一信息。【原文：The pay package of UBS CEO Sergio Ermotti came in just above 15 million Swiss francs ($17 million) in 2024, Swiss daily Blick reported, not citing where it obtained the information.】

item.title: 保时捷 SE 表示不考虑出售大众汽车股份
item.description: 保时捷控股公司周日表示，大众汽车的最大股东保时捷公司（Porsche SE）不考虑出售这家欧洲最大汽车制造商的有投票权的股份，此前有报纸报道称，保时捷公司正在权衡这一举措。【原文：Porsche SE , Volkswagen's biggest shareholder, is not considering selling voting shares in Europe's largest carmaker, the holding firm said on Sunday following a newspaper report that it was weighing such a move.】

item.title: 行业竞争白热化，中国百度推出两款新人工智能模型
item.description: 中国百度周日表示，它已推出两款新的人工智能模型：多模态ERNIE 4.5和一款名为X1的新推理模型，力争在竞争激烈的人工智能竞赛中脱颖而出。【原文：China's Baidu said on Sunday it has launched two new artificial intelligence models, the multimodal ERNIE 4.5 and a new reasoning-focused model called X1, as it vies to stand out in a fiercely competitive AI race.】

item.title: 法新社报道：Telegram 的杜罗夫在调查中获准离开法国
item.description: 据法新社周六报道，法国当局已允许 Telegram 的俄罗斯籍创始人兼首席执行官帕维尔-杜罗夫（Pavel Durov）暂时离开法国，以减轻他在信息应用程序犯罪活动调查中的义务。【原文：French authorities have allowed Pavel Durov, the Russian-born founder and CEO of Telegram, to leave France temporarily in a loosening of his obligations under a probe into criminal activities on the messaging app, the French news agency AFP reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 法新社报道：Telegram 的杜罗夫在调查中获准离开法国
item.description: 据法新社周六报道，法国当局已允许 Telegram 的俄罗斯籍创始人兼首席执行官帕维尔-杜罗夫（Pavel Durov）暂时离开法国，以减轻他在信息应用程序犯罪活动调查中的义务。【原文：French authorities have allowed Pavel Durov, the Russian-born founder and CEO of Telegram, to leave France temporarily in a loosening of his obligations under a probe into criminal activities on the messaging app, the French news agency AFP reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 印度 Zetwerk 公司联合创始人表示计划两年内上市
item.description: 印度 Zetwerk 公司首席执行官兼联合创始人周六表示，该公司正在考虑在 24 个月内上市，而此时这家合同制造商正在加紧电子产品的生产。【原文：India's Zetwerk is considering a stock market listing within 24 months, at a time when the contract manufacturer is ramping up electronics production, its CEO and co-founder said on Saturday.】

item.title: 美国之音员工休假，特朗普盟友称该机构 "无法挽救
item.description: 发给员工的电子邮件告诉他们不要进入工作场所或访问内部系统。【原文：Emails to staff told them not to enter their work premises or access internal systems.】

item.title: 国媒称中国将打击股市假新闻，因为人工智能刺激了错误信息的传播
item.description: 据官方媒体周六报道，中国证券监察机构将加强对股市虚假信息的监控，并与警方和网络空间监管机构合作，打击那些因人工智能而变得更加容易的虚假新闻传播者。【原文：China's securities watchdog will step up monitoring fake information in the stock market and work with the police and cyberspace regulators to crack down on those who disseminate false news, which is being made easier by AI, official media reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 国媒称中国应选择 "适当时机和力度 "放松货币政策
item.description: 周六，中国国家媒体称，中国在放松货币政策时应选择合适的时机和力度，这是一个最新的信号，表明为提振世界第二大经济体而采取的进一步宽松政策可能不会迫在眉睫。【原文：China should choose the right timing and force in easing monetary policy, state media said on Saturday in the latest signal that further easing to boost the world's second-largest economy may not be imminent.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克：搭载特斯拉机器人的星际飞船将于 2026 年底飞往火星
item.description: SpaceX 公司创始人埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周五表示，"星际飞船 "将于明年年底搭载特斯拉仿人机器人 "擎天柱 "前往火星。【原文：SpaceX founder Elon Musk said on Friday that Starship is set to depart for Mars at the end of next year, carrying Tesla humanoid bot Optimus.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克：搭载特斯拉机器人的星际飞船将于 2026 年底飞往火星
item.description: SpaceX 公司创始人埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周五表示，"星际飞船 "将于明年年底搭载特斯拉仿人机器人 "擎天柱 "前往火星。【原文：SpaceX founder Elon Musk said on Friday that Starship is set to depart for Mars at the end of next year, carrying Tesla humanoid bot Optimus.】
